thread.title: Four-star Arkansas QB gets offer from Tennessee
thread.title_full: Four-star Arkansas QB gets offer from Tennessee

title: Four-star Arkansas QB gets offer from Tennessee
text:
Four-star Arkansas QB gets offer from Tennessee A four-star quarterback from Arkansas picked up an offer from Tennessee on Tuesday morning. Slot to Tennessee Links (Photo: 247Sports) 
Four-star junior quarterback Gerry Bohanon of Earle (Ark.) High School posted on his Twitter account Tuesday morning that he received a scholarship offer from Tennessee. 
" Blessed to have received my 9th offer from The University of Tennessee," he tweeted. 
The 6-foot-4, 215-pound Bohanon also holds offers from Alabama, Arkansas, Auburn, Georgia, Memphis, Ole Miss, Mississippi State and Arkansas State. (What's next for the Vols? Make sure you're in the loop ‚Äî take five seconds to sign up for our FREE Vols newsletter now!) 
Bohanon, whose school is located less than 30 miles west of Memphis, Tenn., is ranked the nation's No. 243 overall prospect and No. 10 dual-threat quarterback in the 247Sports Composite for the 2018 class. 
Alabama, Auburn and Ole Miss have received predictions for Bohanon on the 247Sports Crystal Ball. 
Blessed to have received my 9th offer from The University of Tennessee. üçä pic.twitter.com/vFPvcl7Nvi ‚Äî Gerry Bohanon Jr (@iam_phenom) February 21, 2017 Get VIP access to GoVols247 with a FREE 7-DAY TRIAL . Author
